original: I think the bar will be a wonderful place to work. It’ll give me an opportunity to meet people and learn more about Arcadian culture.
I head to the bar and knock on the door. It takes a moment, but a small red Pegasus girl opens the door for me.
Initially she squints at me, a look I’m getting used to. Her heterochromia leaves a striking first impression. However, she seems to be quick on the uptake as she nods her head and smiles
Oh hey! It's Ruby's boyfriend, from the party!
I am definitely not Ruby's boyfriend.
Aha, it's great to see you. Come right on in.
Ah, furless! Yep, you’re definitely the one Penelope mentioned in the letter! Come right on in.
Thank you, the name’s [playername].
Just in case you forgot, I'm Riku.
I’m Riku. It’s always great to see a new face around these parts.
Glad you decided to come work here. It's on a reduced wage but sometimes when you’re new you need a little something to get you off your feet, I get that.
I look around the bar, it’s marvellously antiquated. It’s exactly how I’d imagine a fantasy tavern or mead hall. Bright and cheerful.
Great place you’ve got here.
This entire building is my house, and I’m using the bottom floor as the bar, it’s quaint.
We’re closed at the moment, so let me show you upstairs and we can chill.
Riku and I walk up a set of wooden stairs into a more traditional room.
Seeing this ordinary looking room really shows how well renovated the bottom floor is, it really does look like a fancy bar.
So you're closed, what time do you open?
Only in the afternoon, don’t tend to get many morning drinkers in Arcadia, so there’s no point in being open.
I’m sorry to bother you by coming so early, I can come back later if you’d like.
You’re no bother at all, in fact I gave my grace to Penelope under the pretense that you’d arrive at this time.
You have some kind of plan for me?
Yup, I deal a lot with people around here, perhaps more than most others.
So before we get to work, I felt like I’d take it upon myself to introduce you to the suburbs, while also making a new friend. How about it?
That sounds great.
But first... Take a seat, don't stand around awkwardly hehe.
I take a seat on her sofa while she tidies around us. Seems like she wasn’t prepared for visitors. Regardless it’s quite tidy, it seems Riku is very orderly.
Awesome, as a barmaid I know the word around town. If you’ve got a question, I may have an answer.
Ohh that’s a good one, I’ve heard the strangest thing lately.
People have been talking about having vivid nightmares lately.
As much as I’d like to call it all a buncha crap, I must admit I’ve been stirring in my sleep a little myself.
Rumour is, there’s a witch that has put a curse over Arcadia.
That sounds scary, do you think it’s true?
I just think hysteria is getting to us, if you think about some stupid curse enough it may eventually come true.
And now all of a sudden people have one nightmare and they attribute it to some ‘curse’ to feed the myth.
That’d be easy to say if magic didn’t exist in Arcadia though.
Yeah true, but I spoke about this with Penny a few days back and she said there’s no ‘normal’ magic like that, who am I to argue with the magic nerd?
Fair enough.
You’ve also been referred to work with some of my friends, right?
I gotta say, we’re living in strange times. There was once a time where all six of us would meet up and have a good drink and chat at this bar, but nowadays there has been a notable distance.
I can’t quite put my finger on it, but Butters, Lily and even Honeycrisp barely seem to leave their homes.
It feels like that inner circle has morphed into Penny, Moxie and Ruby, but everyone is so busy lately.
Yeah sorry about that, me and Moxie have been a little preoccupied.
So unfortunately, I don’t have much gossip.
Absolutely feel free to come visit the bar during the evenings, we can make our own gossip! First rounds on me, alright?
I’ll put you up to that.
Hmm, maybe I should convince Melody and Blossom too, those two would be great fun.
Specifically in the bar, you’ll be serving drinks and talking to patrons. You’ll be a riot, girls will love ya.
I’ve been getting that vibe.
If it’s new to you, you’re going to have to get used to it. After a few drinks these mares are even easier than before.
Easier?
Hornier!
Ooohh, isn’t it a bad idea to have me work here then?
Are you kidding? You’ll bring in all my customers! Hahaha.
But don’t worry, before it gets too late your shift will end, just before the mares get too tipsy and touchy.
Touchy? Are they worse at night?
Oh for sure, girls get hornier and hornier as the day goes on. Peaks at midnight, that’s about when I start feeling it anyway, dumb heat.
There’s other work outside of the bar, I’m sure Penny has been great, and given you a bunch of other leads.
In Arcadia hard work gets rewarded, if you offer something to the community you get paid, same goes for here.
Not much to say, I just turned 19 so I guess I’ve peaked in life.
Used to be an athlete, really serious from age 16 on. I wanted to compete in majors, but I ended up getting injured a year back, and I’ve never been the same since.
Did you damage something permanently?
Physically? Nah, I’m fine.
I like drinking, playing games, going to the gym, chatting with my girlies.
Between you and me, I’m an enthusiastic fan of dick. But that’s just my inner heat demon speaking, so pretend you never heard that.
You’ll fluster me with that abrupt attitude.
Hey, I’m reading the list of most common thoughts from my brain.
Booze, games, gym, socialising, dick.
Not always in that order.
If you want the order, it’s gym, socialising, booze, games, then dick.
Is that your plan for today?
Hehehe… Hehehehe… Sure.
What are we going to do this morning then?
Ahh well, I thought maybe I could show you the gym.
The gym? How does that show me around the suburbs?
We can totally do that too, we can go the scenic route.
Lily gave me a permit for the city, so we can go there.
Not the city though, the entire city would take way too long to show you around, that place is bonkers humongous.
And then… the gym?
Yeah, I was gonna go anyway, wouldn’t mind having a gym buddy.
Sure why not, I probably won’t be able to keep up with you though.
I mean heck, she can fly.
Not that special? You have a nice physique though, I thought you’d be a regular at the gym.
I have a nice physique? Are you sure you’re not just used to seeing this covered in fur?
Nah man, don’t sell yourself short, you’re kinda hot.
I feel all fuzzy and warm inside now that she’s said that. I should go to the gym more often and become even hotter, hmm…
Wait, was that her plan?
We head out and she begins a small tour of the village. She’s mainly pointing out the basics, there’s a market, a spa/brothel, a farm, a bakery, the library, the boutique…
Of course, this isn’t new to me at this point, but she adds a funny anecdote to each observation, it’s interesting to hear.
Right away we can see the market here, and just next to it is the spa/brothel. Not unusual for them and the bar to have a close working relationship if you know what I mean.
That I do. Is the brothel, I mean uh, spa any good?
I used to get a few massages to relieve muscle tension, great for that. Can’t say what the other services are like though.
There’s also the bakery, they make cakes you could die for. I wouldn’t eat more than one a week though unless you were going to put on the pounds.
If I’m going to be become a regular customer, I’ll definitely need to visit the gym more.
I’m glad I’m not on a strict athlete diet anymore, I can balance the calories burnt at the gym with delicious cake.
Always a great reason to go to the gym, guilt free luxuries.
If you peek just to the left of the bakery, you can see Honey’s farmhouse in the distance.
Honey, now that’s one hot piece of ass. If the two of us were ever alone and drunk enough, I reckon I’d go for it.
Unfortunately I don’t think she’s into mares, oh well.
Actually, you’re in luck, she is into mares.
You’re kidding?
Wait, how do you even know that?
Ah, you know what, I’m not even gonna ask.
Haven’t seen her since… well… moving on.
You probably already know about the library, right? We can skip that nerdy stuff.
Nerdy? I saw some books in your house.
Pfft, ya got me! I love myself a good book as much as those unicorns do.
They read boring sciency books though, I like reading actiony things.
Any good suggestions?
Brave Boo and the Orange Chicken is fantastic, I’m nearly at the third act and it’s riveting.
I’m sorry, what?

Brave Boo? How have you not heard of her? She’s a treasure hunter that goes to different historical locations and looks for ancient artifacts, in this latest epic she’s looking for a legendary orange chicken, however it turns out to be…
She’s even nerdier than the unicorns!
Ahh… I’m boring you, aren’t I?
Oh no, not at all, something about a chicken, right?
Whatever man! Look, we’re nearly at the gym, there are two places to point out here.
There’s Moxie’s wagon, extremely charismatic and entertaining. I wish she’d perform in the market more often, I’d get to see her out of my window.
I'm glad you pointed out the wagon, that's one place I have no idea about.
Pfft, your sarcasm is duly noted.
Here's something you probably don't know about the wagon area though, that's actually a clearing for a travelling circus that comes once a year. You just missed it though.
Awh damn.
Just past the wagon you have that big looming boutique, scary place! They make clothes!
Who for? I don’t know, Ruby is a whimsical character indeed.
I know I certainly wouldn’t be caught dead wearing one of those frilly dresses, heh.
I could tell her they make lingerie, but I’ll keep quiet.
Alright, let’s head to the gym. Figured I’ll pay for your membership, my treat.
Actually, I’m sharing Moxie’s membership, so you don’t need to worry about that.
Oh, you’re not supposed to do that! I’ll stay hush though.
Appreciate it, say, aren’t you worried about hanging around a male all day?
What, just because I’m in heat?
Well, yeah…
That and working out together, hot, sweat, exercise and all that.
You’re making me feel nostalgic. I used to work out with my last gym buddy, then we’d go home and cap it off with sex.
Mmm... Hmph...
She soon snaps from daydreaming to anger.
Then the shithead ditches me for some slut.
Oh? What happened?
I don’t know… She was some bimbo with big tits, it won’t last, guarantee it.
I wonder if she has a complex about her breasts.
Eugh, kinda? It’s not like he was special, he was just a guy.
If anything he should have been grateful to be with me.
Thin, attractive, good money, stable job, good in bed.
But you know sometimes that’s just not good enough for some people.
Whaaat? No!
I’m not like that bimbo that sleeps around with anything! You have to earn me.
I mean plenty of stallions come into my bar, you won't see me sleeping around with them.
I need to get to know someone first. I’m not about that sleezy life, I’ve been at a bar and seen the worst of it.
And my old gym buddy and that bimbo was the worst of it.
You sure there isn’t something you’re not telling me? I’m not sure why you would be this mad over a single friend with benefits.
Hmph… You’re not just nodding and yes-manning me. I respect that.
A lot of guys, especially this time of year will do whatever a mare says to please and placate them.
But yeah, you’re right... There is something else that I find a little harder to talk about.
Tch, you see… He wanted to start a relationship, but I was too reluctant to commit to anything.
We were friends, and the sex was good, but I just couldn’t see it going anywhere.
If that’s the case, why are you so hurt? You two were only friends.
Yeah, yeah, I know… Let’s sit on this bench before we go into the gym, I can’t run while ranting.
So this dude is frustrated that I won’t date him, right?
He sleeps with me one night. Then the next evening there’s a drunk mare flirting with him, and he goes off with her.
Flirting and lovey-dovey, right in front of my face, while I serve them both alcohols. I was enraged.
He goes off and fucks her, then acts like he did nothing wrong because we’re just ‘friends with benefits’.
Heck, isn’t that what I’m doing? Time to enquire.
Was he wrong to sleep with someone else, especially considering he has no obligation to stay loyal to you?
Tch, no, I guess not. But he acted like he wouldn’t, we had this unspoken rule of not sleeping with others.
Also, the bastard did it right in front of me! If you’re going to sleep with someone else, at least have the dignity to do it behind their back.
I can empathise, I imagine Moxie would get extremely jealous if I flirted with someone else while she was around, I would too.
If he had done it behind my back and one day earnestly mention he had slept with someone else; I probably would have reluctantly shrugged it off.
The two ended up dating, he ditched me real fast.
Why can’t you shrug it off regardless? If he’s out of your life now, you don’t have to worry about it.
Well the thing that pissed me off the most was his smug attitude the next time we met up. He told me about how it was ‘great sex’, and he might see her a few more times.
He bragged about the things she did in bed, that I don't.
I was honest to him, if he was gonna act like a dick, he can go fuck off back to her.
He played the victim, acted like he was justified and stormed out.
I see, so it was an attitude problem.
Yeah, the way I see it, he was trying to emotionally blackmail me into being his girlfriend, I ain’t having that shit.
You’re right though, he is a loser. I should just shrug it off because I can find someone better.
A better friend with benefits?
Hehe, crap. I did make it sound like that a bit, didn’t I?
Well, this time of year, I’ll make do with anything. As long as it’s a good man, know what I mean?
Life’s too short to stick around toxic people that only bring you down.
You’re right, there’re plenty of amazing people around here that just want the best for everyone.
Ain’t that the truth, surround yourself with good people.
Phew, that was a long tangent.
Long story short, yeah I will get horny hanging around a male all day. But I can control myself, don’t worry your furry feet, [playername].
Oh right, that saying doesn’t work for you and your furless feet.
No, I guess it doesn’t. Let’s see how these feet compare in the gym?
Let’s do it!
The two of us head to the gym and she absolutely obliterates me at everything we do.
She runs faster than me, she lifts bigger weights than me, she can do every higher intensity option.
All whilst being smaller than me, and appearing relatively innocuous.
We build up quite a sweat, but a combination of air conditioning, cold bottled water, and towels stave off the sweat to keep me going.
After being shown up by the athletic Pegasus we grab lunch before heading back to the bar and opening up.
Serving drinks is really simple, just grab a glass pop it under this tap and turn the knob. Take the money, into the register, return the change, and job’s a good’un.
Daisy is in the back washing up and clearing tables, she’ll probably help us serve drinks if it gets a bit busier too.
Not bad, this seems like a relaxing job.
It can get busier lately, we’re the only bar this side of Arcadia. So, there’s another worker for the evening shift. You’re just here extra as a favour, so don’t worry too much, we’ll look after you.
Am I really helping? I won’t just get in the way?
Honestly yeah, if you’re down here that means I can be in the office doing some boring shit, rather than having to stay up late into the evening to do it.
I guess in a literal sense you’re taking a large workload off my back; I definitely appreciate that.
Alright, I think I can handle things around here, thanks for showing me.
Sweet, I’ll be in the back, gimme a buzz if you need me for anything at all.
She heads off and I get ready to do the best job possible.
Of all times but now I feel oddly naked standing behind this counter. I think I know why too.
I feel like I should be in a uniform, you definitely can’t have a nametag without a uniform.
Speaking of that though, I’ve noticed a lot of subtle differences in my time here. The lack of clothing has radically altered the demands of ponies.
Riku often carries around a satchel to carry objects in because she doesn’t have pockets. Handbags and satchels are quite common, including the one I own.
That’s probably the reason why mobile phones don’t seem to exist in this world, but laptops and computers do. There simply was no demand for a small computer that can fit in a pocket.
Lost in thought and here comes my first customer, a cute mare! Heck yeah, although 85 percent of the population in Arcadia are cute mares.
The next one seems a little older, almost MILF-y. I’ve noticed that the fur causes ponies to age immensely well, wrinkles are far less noticeable.
Given that everyone is nude, people in this world also seem to take better care of their bodies, although there are perhaps multiple factors going into that.
It feels strange to say, but I’ve yet to see an unattractive individual in this society. Beauty is definitely high value when you’re nude, and hence so open and vulnerable.
That reminds me of Ruby, gosh her body was utterly stunning.
The younger customer is eventually joined by another mare, and the two come up to order drinks and we make some small talk.
They’re not completely unphased that I’m not a pony, but their reaction is positive and small talk between them is full of niceties.
The two mares head off to chat amongst themselves at a table. It’s not long before another customer heads in, an even older mare, perhaps retired that chooses to drink alone.
She even called me a ‘young man’ when she thanked me.

Daisy the other girl that works here is pleasant to talk to, however she seems notably disinterested in me. Our conversations never escaped small talk as she’d soon find something else to distract herself with.
Hours pass and customers come and go.
In my world when you buy something from a shop or a bar it tends to be transactional, at least for me anyway.
You’d say what you want, get it, pay and say thank you.
But almost every single customer, even the occasional stallion has made an effort to talk to me and ask me various questions.
The pure, happy vibe of this bar, and the people here leave a smile on my face every time.
There was one couple that were particularly interested in me, it was a mare clinging to the arm of a tall stallion.
They actually dared to ask me what I was.
I imagine a lot of people want to ask that, but feel like it’s too rude. I don’t mind though, I just haven’t figured out a satisfactory answer.
I’m a species from far away.
They usually ask where ‘far away’ is, and suddenly I don’t have an answer.
Sometimes honesty is the best policy though, just tell ‘em I was wrapped up in a magic related incident. It’s a great talking point.
’Magic? What kind of magic incident?’, ‘Are you like a dragon, can you breathe fire?’, ‘Do you get much action?’, ‘What do you think about Riku?’, ‘You think she’s hot?’.
Actually… These are a lot of questions, and they’re getting strangely personal.
And then something strange happens when I’m chatting with this couple, Riku is in the corner of my eye prompting me to come with her.
As I leave, I can hear the couple laugh as they realize what happened. And then it all clicks together.
Me and Riku head upstairs and she rolls her eyes.
They finally decided to show their faces in here, they were basically interviewing you with all those inane questions. Daisy told me.
I wouldn’t call it an interview, but I suppose they were asking a lot of questions.
Are they who I think they are?
Yep, the ol’ gym buddy wanker, and his new sleeve.
Oohh, that’s brutal.
It’s whatever, your shift is practically over. Velour is here now; she’ll cover for you.
Here’s your pay, 25 smackaroos. It’s not exactly much, but it’s just what you need right?
Yeah, I don’t have much use for money except for feeding myself.

Alright, but I can do a bit better than 25 monies. How about we have a few drinks to celebrate your first shift? I could use the distraction; I don’t want to go down there while those two are sneering.
Sure, I’ve got time. No point going to a bar without having a few, right?
That’s the attitude, let me grab a few cold ones.
Pony brew beer?
Ohh, I was wrong, Riku comes back with cold bottles of cider from the fridge.
I should have figured that out, it’s the same stuff Honeycrisp makes.
Ahh, I love this stuff.
It’s the best, ain’t it?
Thanks for the cider.
It’s Honeycrisp’s special, thank her when you get the chance.
I take a swig and its sweetness combined with its coolness hits the spot, especially after being stood serving drinks for hours.
Those two were quite nosy.
Yeah, they probably saw that there was a new man in the house, so they wanted to get as much juicy info as possible.
Nothing to tell really, we just met. No juice!
I think there’s a little bit of juice. Darn, hanging around a guy all day does make you horny. Is it just me, or do you feel it as well?
I kinda noticed it, but I’ve mostly been preoccupied with work.
Hmm, right, I’ve been sat in my office doing spreadsheets.
Hah, were you distracted?
Pfft, like I’d tell you.
You kinda already told me, you said you were horny.
Ah shit, I did imply that. I didn’t think before I said it.
She takes a long swig of her alcoholic cider.
How about you tell me something about you to make it even?
You accidentally slipped up; I’m not obligated to return the favour!
Awh come on, it’s just a laugh ain’t it.
I don’t even know what I’d say though.
I take another sip of my cider. Mmm, this stuff is really moreish.
Hmm, how about this, truth or dare?
First to refuse loses!
Her stubborn competitive nature is going to make this really interesting.
Hell yes I am! You’ve got spirit, [playername]. I feel like you and me see eye to eye.
I think we could get to know each other more with a game like this.
Hmph, even if it does, it’s just in the spirit of the game, right?
I guess, are you sure you want to commit to what you may be committing to?
Hey, like I said, first to refuse loses, I ain’t going down without a fight.
I wonder if she's truly considering the implications of this game.
What do I get if I win?
If you win? Haha, that won’t happen!
Sure, what does the winner get then?
I dunno, how about the other person has to be a slave to the other?
Seems paradoxical for the punishment of not following an order to be made to follow orders.
Don’t get tricky with me, I think it’s a clever idea!
Fine, how about the slave orders are only allowed to be as bad as the truth/dare refused?
Yeah, I like that idea. It escalates the stakes the further the game goes on.
Next time you come to my bar, one of us will be the other’s slave for the day.
Deal.
It’s on! Truth or dare?
I’m glad you picked truth, now I can make it even.
I think all ideas of even-ness went out the window as soon as we started playing truth or dare.
Here’s your question. Have you been sleeping with any other mares in Arcadia?
Yeah, I have.
Ohhh, what? Anyone I know?
You only have one question, Riku.
Awh damnit, I should have been more careful with my wording.
She crosses her arms and pouts, thinking of a way to get me back no doubt.
A first turn dare? Well aren’t you brave.
Figured I’d throw you for a loop, since it sounded like you had a question prepared.
You got me there, I don’t have a dare prepared, but I’m good at improvising.
She points at my cider and winks.
I dare you to finish that off in one go.
Awh… Such a waste if I can’t savour it.
If you do it, I’ll get you another one from the fridge. Go on!
It’s still just over half-full, but a dare is a dare.
I bring the cusp of the bottle to my lips and start to chug it.
After a few patient gulps and some nose breathing, it goes down quite well.
Riku seems content and fetches another two bottles of cider, one for me and another for her, seems like she’s a faster drinker than I am.
Alright, my turn, I pick dare to start with.
I should build up the intensity of my dares slowly. Maybe try and target some of her weaknesses.
I could try to embarrass her, maybe use her heat to my advantage.
W-wha? What a cruel first dare! You’re really going there, huh?
Using my femininity to your advantage, what a punk.
I’ll show you; I can use my femininity to my own advantage.
You can think of ways to do that while you sit on my lap.
She begrudgingly shuffles over to me, before hoisting herself onto my lap. Her thighs unflinchingly locked together, and she avoids any body contact other than where she’s seated on my lap.
Hey, your skin is really soft, what the hell? I thought it’d be leathery and rough.
I’m full of surprises you know.
You better not get a boner, damn perv.
As long as you don’t drip on me, we should be good.
I’m bluffing, it’s surprisingly hard to avoid getting erect while she’s sat on me, even though she’s explicitly making sure she puts no pressure on my genitals.
Wait, how long am I doing this? We never agreed to a time!
I accidentally brush my hand past her thigh as I bring it to scratch my nose, causing her to jump.
Uwah! I can feel something brushing against me! Don’t tell me that’s what I think it is?
She scurries off and looks in-between my thighs. I’m a teeny, tiny bit erect, but no way near enough to brush against Riku.
Oh… Must have been my imagination…
I’m gonna get you back for this! Truth or dare!
S-Serenade? Are you kidding?
I’m not a tenth drunk enough to do something that embarrassing.
What’s that? You want to be my slave for a day? I’m going to make you do more embarrassing things if that happens.
Pfft, I’ll do it, but you’re a loser.
Uh, I don’t know what to do, I don’t know any serenades…
Nothing at all?
Well, I listen to metal and shit, so… I'm going to put on some music.
Eh-hem…
She tries to serenade me, is this a serenade? I don't know, the song doesn't seem to have anything to do with love at all.
I give her points for the effort though.
Wow...
Was it not supposed to be like that? You said serenade! Like, singing!
Haha, that wasn’t a love song, that was uh... heavy metal.
Eugh, did I do it wrong? Whatever, I did your dare! It’s your turn now.
I imagine the truths and dares are going to get pretty brutal from here on.
She’s going to ask some tough and embarrassing questions that might change the way she looks at me, especially since she seems to be against sleeping around.
Her truths will be bad, but what will her dares be like? Painful, sexual?
Dares are her real opportunity to give me something in the hopes I’ll fail.
Come on, truth or dare?
Perfect, I can get you back for the dare you gave me.
I was too nice to you on the first turn.
She takes a break in the middle of her sentence to gulp down some cider.
I’m gonna start being mean now.
The room is heating up; the intensity is increasing!
Now that I know you’ve slept with a mare before, I gotta ask, who was it?
Hmm, she assumes it was only one person, when in reality it’s a few now.
I’ve slept with Moxie.
Ohoh, my gosh! Really?
She’s a performer in sheets as well as the streets.
I have to say, she gives a great vocal performance.
Haha, good one! Gimme five.
We high-five each other, then she has a quick realisation that we’re not on the same side in this game.
Wait, shit! That question was too easy, maybe I need to get my head out the gutter and ask something actually embarrassing.
Perfect, I can get you back for the dare you gave me.
I was too nice to you on the first turn.
She takes a break in the middle of her sentence to gulp down some cider.
I’m gonna start being mean now.
The room is heating up; the intensity is increasing!
I’ve had a bit more time to think of a good dare, so you’ll have to ready yourself.
You know that gym work was really hard, how about a nice wing massage?
That’s her dare? I really don’t mind doing that, I hope she’s not missing the point of the game. Or am I missing the point of it?
Oh well, her wings spread outwards, splayed out for the first time, it’s a gorgeous sight.
I have no idea what I’m doing, but I’ll rub your… I don’t know.
I’ll fondle you and see what you enjoy, I guess.
Take your time, it feels fantastic anywhere, and I haven’t had one in months because the damn spa doesn’t do them.

She turns her back to me and I start working at her wings. I figure working the feathers isn’t much use, so I focus on the appendages that sprout out from the top of her back, and slowly work my way out to the tips of her wings.
Riku lets out a few sighs and ‘oooh’s, but it really doesn’t seem sexual, relaxing if anything.
Mmm I knew it, your hands feel far better than a stallion’s.
